Wands

Wands are magical items in Remixed Dungeon that store charges and have various magical effects when used.

Types of Wands

  • Wand of Magic Missile - Basic damage wand
  • Wand of Firebolt - Fire damage and burning effect
  • Wand of Frost - Cold damage and slowing effect
  • Wand of Lightning - Electric damage through chain
  • Wand of Disintegration - High damage with piercing effect
  • Wand of Avalanche - Area damage and stun effect
  • Wand of Telekinesis - Remote item and enemy manipulation
  • Wand of Regrowth - Creates grass and heal effects
  • Wand of Poison - Applies poison status effect
  • Wand of Amok - Causes confusion in enemies
  • Wand of Fear - Causes terror status effect
  • Wand of Life Drain - Life drain effect
  • Wand of Blink - Short distance teleportation
  • Wand of Prismatic Light - Light damage and effects

Mechanics

  • Charges: Wands have limited charges that refresh over time
  • Recharging: Charges gradually return when wielded, or faster when in mana pools
  • Upgrading: Upgrades increase damage, range, or other properties
  • Zapping: Use action to activate the wand's effect
  • Durability: Wands can break after extended use

Strategy

  • Charge Management: Be mindful of remaining charges
  • Tactical Use: Wands can be used defensively as well as offensively
  • Upgrading Priority: Often worth upgrading early for consistent effects
  • Class Synergy: Mages and Warlocks benefit most from wand use

Acquisition

  • Found in shops
  • Dropped by various enemies
  • Found in treasure rooms
  • Wandmaker NPC specializes in wands

See Also

  • Equipment - Equipment system overview
  • Spells - Alternative to wands
  • Mana - Resource that helps recharge wands
